Comment: At the end of 2024, Airbus had a backlog of 8,658 aircraft and Boeing's backlog at the end of 2024 was 5,595 aircraft - a significant amount of which are 737s.  In 2024, Airbus produced 820 aircraft while Boeing only delivered 348.  The erosion of Boeings market is well under way and will accelerate under current condisions of quality confidence and US policy.  A once great company and market leader. As DJT would say...sad.    Source: 2024 Annual Reports.
